Highlights in Jazz #19: Jazz World Salute to Lionel Hampton (Tape 3 of 3)
Highlights in Jazz #19: Jazz World Salute to Lionel Hampton (Tape 3 of 3)

Performers on this recording include Lionel Hampton, Teddy Wilson, Buddy Rich, Milt Hinton, George Duvivier, Frank Foster, Paul Jeffrey, Jual Curtis, Bob Rosengarden, Harold Mabern, Jimmy Nottingham, Stella Mars, Clark Terry, Cecil Payne, and William B. Williams.

Original format: 1/2 inch open reel video; Transfer Technician Notes: "As with other tapes in this collection, there is an inherent constant sync error that is stabilized by time base correction, but ultimately results in moderate to severe flagging throughout. This flagging is generally above the performers, but intensifies in low lighting. Mild image jitter throughout. Elsewhere, there are frequent mild dropouts, and occasional tape damage and sync errors. Occasional inherent exposure adjustments and mild ghosting. Luma is adjusted to mitigate clipping from glare. Audio distortion is inherent to the original recording."
